items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape’s 99% Isopropyl Alcohol prepares the skin for wig adhesive bonding. Available in bulk and ideal for medical and cleaning purposes. Shop now!">
items.storedetaileddescription:
What is 99% Alcohol?

   

 

Walker Tape®’s 99% Alcohol is an essential tool for proper scalp prep and cleanliness. It effectively removes oil, dirt, and residue from both the skin and your workstation surfaces, ensuring a clean foundation for a long-lasting and secure bond.

   

 

Why use Bond Breaker Shampoo?

   

  • Cleans Skin Effectively: Removes oils, residue, and dirt, ensuring the skin is prepared for a secure adhesive bond.
  • Multi-Purpose: Ideal for cleaning skin, tools, and surfaces for the best install experience
  • No Residue: Evaporates quickly, leaving no residue or sticky feeling on the skin.
  • Medical Grade: Made with medical-grade gentleness for skin.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable - do not store near or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Use in a well-ventilated area. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use.

   

 

Storage

   

Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). SDS sheet is available below.
items.storedescription:
How to Use 99% Alcohol

     

 We recommend performing a patch test before use.

    

 

Directions

 
  1. Saturate a Sponge Brush with 99% Alcohol.
  2. Apply a thin layer evenly across your client’s scalp, or the area you wish to sanitize. Wait a few seconds for the alcohol to evaporate.
  3. If you are installing a hair system, apply 99% Alcohol first, followed by a scalp protector, and then your tape or adhesive.
items.pagetitle: 99% Isopropyl Alcohol – Scalp Cleaner for Wig Adhesive Bonding | Walker Tape
